properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I danced in the morning
when the world was begun
I danced in the Moon,
and the stars, and the Sun
I came down from Heaven
and I danced on Earth
At Bethlehem I had my birth.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Dance then, wherever
you may be
I am the Lord of the Dance,
said He!
And I'll lead you all,
wherever you may be
And I'll lead you all
in the Dance, said He!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I danced for the scribe
and the pharisee
They would not dance,
they wouldn't follow me
So I danced for the fishermen
James and John
They come with me and
the Dance went on:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I danced on the Sabbath
and cured the lame
The holy people, they
said it was a shame!
They whipped and stripped
and then hung me high
Left me there on a cross to die!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I danced on a Friday when
the sky turned black
It's hard to dance with the
devil on your back
They buried my body and
they thought I'd gone
But I am the Dance
and I still go on!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
They cut me down
but I leap up high
I am the Life that will
never never die!
I live in you if you
live in Me
I am the Lord of
the Dance, said He!
